author: mrdon
msg: Adding checks to ensure validator will fail if field isn't present in
form.

author: imario
msg: *) Again refactored the filename parsing stuff. Still room for improvements/cleanup but we are on the way.
Now VFS only escapes parts of the uri which are internally used. That is:
% - generally
! - sometimes e.g. archive base filesystems (jar/tar)
? - for http/webdav filesystems for special handling of the query string
*) FileObject.findFiles now returns null if the base file do not exist.
Submitted By: tcurdt -at- apache.org
*) SftpFileSystem now correctly handles files with space in its name
*) Moved on to commons-net 1.4 but still backward compatible to 1.2
*) src/utils: unix script to recreated the archive files used by some tests

author: mrdon
msg: Adding a listing and description of all possible attributes for the
exception element.  Also included a description of what happens when no
'handler' attribute is specified.

author: mrdon
msg: Filter anchors out when determining action mapping name

author: mrdon
msg: * Adding the ability to load classes with a desired classloader
* Config factories now use the Digester classloader
